summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ERP software project (sustech_kpi_dashboard). Successfully tested demo login, dashboard KPIs, all module navigation, charts, and interactive features. Frontend functionality is working excellently with proper data display and navigation.

critical_bugs.issue: All tRPC API endpoints return 401 Unauthorized when accessed directly via HTTP requests
critical_bugs.impact: Backend API testing cannot be performed via direct HTTP calls
critical_bugs.details: Demo mode cookie authentication works in browser but not for direct API calls. Frontend integration works properly through browser session.

passed_tests: Demo login functionality - 'Demo Mode (Admin Access)' button works perfectly
Dashboard loads with all KPIs (Revenue MTD, Orders Today, Active Tenders, Tasks Due)
Dashboard charts render correctly (Revenue Overview, Tender Pipeline)
Sales module navigation and KPI display (10 metric elements, 4 tabs)
Projects module - displays 5 projects with pipeline stages
Customers module - shows 5 seeded customers with proper categorization
Financial module - AR/AP data displayed with aging chart
HR module - shows 5 departments and employee counts (6 total users)
Action Tracker - displays action items with proper categorization
Tender/Quotation - shows government tenders and quotations with proper tracking
Sidebar navigation works correctly between all modules
Home navigation returns to dashboard successfully
Interactive buttons are clickable (Quick Actions tested)
All modules have proper graphical presentations and charts
Seeded demo data is properly displayed across all modules
action_item_for_main_agent: Backend API authentication needs to be configured to work with demo mode for direct HTTP requests. Currently only browser-based authentication works. This doesn't affect user functionality but prevents API testing.
